name: Obhizatrik Foundation
description: A reactJS project with AntDesign UI library at frontend. This website is for Obhizatrik Foundation. Also there are systems for online payment.

name: Rental app
description: A next.js application for Rental app for electrical equipments ##Opinions regarding the task: # I have used Material UI for easy implementation of any future optimization in this app # I have used a layout option for the app that can be used for multiple pages also in future optimization.

description: A next.js application for Rental app for developers' meetup ##Opinions regarding the task: # I have used CSS in moduler way for easy implementation of any future optimization in this app # I have used a layout option for the app that can be used for multiple pages also in future optimization

name: User Analyzer for food delivery app

name: Weather app
description: A next.js application for weather update. This project uses OPENWEATHER map API to check the current weather on any city on the planet. Switch between metric and imperial units.

name: e-commerce app
description: A next.js application for e-commerce website. ##Opinions regarding the task: # I have followed Vercel's Big-commerce app for easy implementation of any future optimization in this app # I have used a layout option for the app that can be used for multiple pages also in future optimization.

name: small e-commerce app

name: egg-villa-ecommerce
description: An E-commerce app using based on Firebase using Stripe.

name: audio-player
description: React/NextJS audio player for your music, with custom controls, playlist, filters, and search functionality.

name: calculator
description: A calculator project built with React. ## Features: 1. Add, subtract, multiply, divide, 2. Support decimal values, 3. Calculate percentages, 4. Invert the values, 5. Reset functionality, 6. Format larger numbers, 7. Output resize based on length

name: memory-game
description: A Svelte application for memory game. A memory game, where users have to remember the positions of the cards and open two exact images sequentially to score points. Once all the cards are opened user is victorious. I used Unsplash API to fetch images from their site.

name: tic-tac-toe
description: A Svelte application for tick tac toe game.

name: Breakout
description: A Svelte application for breakout game.

name: voice-cue
description: React/NextJS voice recognition app. The app workflow is as simple as uploading your voice recording, selecting which type of analysis to perform and clicking on the generated cues in the list to instantly navigate to its exact position in the voice recording.

name: rock-paper-scissors
description: A Svelte application for rock paper scissors game.

name: CropScore
description: A next.js application for picture cropper. That is used for a set cropping size of different famous websites. CropScore is an online image cropper for content creators, that calculates the score of how well the real-time crop will fit for the target use. The user is in full control of the upper and lower bounds of the resolutions and the correct aspect ratios are automatically set. All you have to do is drag and see the magic.

name: Akkhor
description: A next.js application for e-commerce website. ##Opinions regarding the task: # I have used material UI for easy implementation of any future optimization in this app # I have used a layout option for the app that can be used for multiple pages also in future optimization.
